description: A frustrated writer struggles to keep his family alive when a series of global catastrophes threatens to annihilate mankind.

review.author: benxrichardson
review.heading: An intense thrill fest
review.reviewBody:
I think the hate for this film is overblown. Of course it's far fetched but the non stop action and exceptional special effects are gripping.

John Cusac plays the protagonist role well. His flawed yet likeable style makes him an engaging character.

keywords: earthquake,end of the world,apocalypse,elizabeth i character,disaster film
